data.text: Hello! I am $s1. You are $s2, right? Hehehe
Withdraw the fee for the next time at $s1/$s2 $s3
A non-permitted target has been discovered.
I will definitely repay this humiliation!
I'll definitely kill you next time!
There is no reason for you to kill me! I have nothing you need!
I won't just stand still while you hit me.
Am I the neighborhood drum for beating!
I'll give you ten million arena if you let me live!
$s1. Stop kidding yourself about your own powerlessness!
$s1. I'll make you feel what true fear is!
You're really stupid to have challenged me. $s1! Get ready!
$s1. Do you think that's going to work?!
I will definitely reclaim my honor which has been tarnished!
Show me the wrath of the knight whose honor has been downtrodden!
I'll never sleep until I've shed my dishonor!
I'm here for the ones that are cursing the world!
I'll turn you into a malignant spirit!
I'll curse you with the power of revenge and hate!
Do you dare pit your power against me?
I am conveying the will of Nurka! Everybody get out of my way!
Those who stand against me shall die horribly!
Do you dare to block my way?!
You heathen blasphemers of this holy place will be punished!
Step forward, you worthless creatures who challenge my authority!
My creator... The unchanging faithfulness to my master...
Master of the tower... My master... master... Where is he?
I AM THE ONE CARRYING OUT THE WILL OF CORE.
According to the command of Beleth... I'm going to observe you guys!
You people make me sick! No sense of loyalty whatsoever!
A challenge against me is the same as a challenge against Beleth...
Beleth is always watching over you guys!
That was really close! Antharas opened its eyes!
You who disobey the will of Antharas! Die!
I crossed back over the marshlands of death to reclaim the treasure!
Bring over and surrender your precious gold treasure to me!
I'll kill you in an instant!
Invaders of Dragon Valley will never live to return!
I am the guardian that honors the command of Antharas to watch over this place!
You've set foot in Dragon Valley without permission! The penalty is death!
The joy of killing! The ecstasy of looting! Hey guys, let's have a go at it again!
There really are still lots of folks in the world without fear! I'll teach you a lesson!
If you hand over everything you've got, I'll at least spare your life!
Kneel down before one such as this!
Honor the master's wishes and punish all the invaders!
Follow the master's wishes and punish the invaders!
Death is nothing more than a momentary rest...
Listen! This is the end of the human era! Antharas has awoken!
Present the lives of four people to Antharas!
This is unbelievable! How could I have lost to one so inferior to myself?
I carry the power of darkness and have returned from the abyss.
In the name of Orfen, I can never forgive you who are invading this place!
I'll make you pay the price for fearlessly entering Orfen's land!
Even if you disappear into nothingness, you will still face the life-long suffering of the curse that I have given you.
I'll stand against anyone that makes light of the sacred place of the Elves!
I will kill with my own hands anyone that defiles our home!
My brothers will never rest until we push you and your gang out of this valley!
Until the day of destruction of Hestui!
If any intrepid Orcs remain, attack them!
The sparkling mithril of the dwarves and their pretty treasures! I'll get them all!
Where are all the dreadful dwarves and their sparkling things?
Hey! You should have run away!
DESTRUCTION - EXTINCTION - SLAUGHTER - COLLAPSE! DESTRUCTION - EXTINCTION - SLAUGHTER - COLLAPSE!
Wah, ha, ha, ha! Uthanka has taken over this island today!
How exasperating and unfair to have things happen in such a meaningless way like this...
This world should be filled with fear and sadness...
I won't forgive the world that cursed me!
I'll make everyone feel the same suffering as me!
I'll give you a curse that you'll never be able to remove forever!
I'll get revenge on you who slaughtered my compatriots!
Those who are afraid should get away and those who are brave should fight!
I've got power from Beleth so do you think I'll be easily defeated?!
I am leaving now, but soon someone will come who will teach you all a lesson!
Hey guys, let's make a round of our territory!
The rumor is that there are wild, uncivilized ruffians who have recently arrived in my territory.
Do you know who I am?! I am Sirocco! Everyone, attack!
What's just happened?! The invincible Sirocco was defeated by someone like you?!
What does honey of this place taste like?!
Give me some sweet, delicious golden honey!
If you give me some honey, I'll at least spare your life...
Only for lack of honey did I lose to the likes of you.
Look in every nook and cranny around here!
Are you Lackey of Kuroboros?! I'll knock you out in one shot!
He just closed his eyes without disposing of the traitor... How unfair!
The person that does not believe in kuroboros, his life will soon become hell!
The lackey of that demented devil, the servant of a false god! I'll send that fool straight to hell!
Uh... I'm not dying; I'm just disappearing for a moment... I'll resurrect again!
Hail to Kuroboros, the founder of our religion!
Only those who believe in Patriarch Kuroboros shall receive salvation!
Are you the ones that Sharuk has incited?! You also should trust in Kuroboros and be saved!
You who have beautiful spirits that shine brightly! I have returned!
You that are weary and exhausted... Entrust your souls to me.
The color of your soul is very attractive.
Those of you who live! Do you know how beautiful your souls are?!
I will never forgive the Pixy Murika... that is trying to... kill us!
Attack all the dull and stupid followers of Murika!
I didn't have any idea about such ambitions!
This is not the end... It's just the beginning.
Hey... Shall we have some fun for the first time in a long while?...
There've been some things going around like crazy here recently...
Hey! Do you know who I am? I am Malex, Herald of Dagoniel! Attack!
What's just happened?! The invincible Malex just lost to the likes of you?!
It's something repeated in a vain life...
Shake in fear, all you who value your lives!
I'll make you feel suffering like a flame that is never extinguished!
Where am I? Who am I?
Uh... My head hurts like it's going to burst! Who am I?
You jerk. You're a devil! You're a devil to have made me like this!
Where am I? What happened? Thank you!
The people who are blocking my way will not be forgiven...
There has been no winning lottery ticket.
The most recent winning lottery numbers
Your lucky numbers have been selected above.
I wonder who it is that is lurking about..
Sacred magical research is conducted here.
Behold the awesome power of magic!
Your powers are impressive but you must not annoy our high level sorcerer.
I am Barda, master of the Bandit Stronghold!
I, Master Barda, once owned that stronghold,
You are more powerful than you appear. We'll meet again!
Why would you build a tower in our territory?
Are you part of that evil gang of sorcerers?
That is why I don't bother with anyone below the level of sorcerer.
Our specialties are arson and looting.
Ah, so you admire my treasure, do you? Try finding it! Ha!
Is everybody listening? Sirion has come back. Everyone chant and bow...
Don't think that you are invincible just because you defeated me!
The material desires of mortals are ultimately meaningless.
Do not forget the reason the Tower of Insolence collapsed.
You humans are all alike, full of greed and avarice!
What are all these people doing here?
I must find the secret of eternal life, here among these rotten angels!
Do you also seek the secret of immortality?
I shall never reveal my secrets!
This is no place for humans! You must leave immediately.
You poor creatures! Too stupid to realize your own ignorance!
The humans must not be allowed to destroy the marshland for their greedy purposes.
You idiots! Some day you shall also be gone!
The forest is very quiet and peaceful.
Stay here in this wonderful forest!
This forest is a dangerous place.
Unless you leave this forest immediately you are bound to run into serious trouble.
Why do you ignore my warning?
Harits of the world... I bring you peace!
I shall eat your still-beating heart!.
Harits! Keep faith until the day I return... Never lose hope!
Even the giants are gone! There's nothing left to be afraid of now!
Have you heard of the giants? Their downfall was inevitable!
What nerve! Do you dare to challenge me?
You are as evil as the giants...
This dungeon is still in good condition!
This place is spectacular, wouldn't you say?
Are the giants truly gone for good?
Gold and silver are meaningless to a dead man!
Why would those corrupt aristocrats bury such useful things?
You filthy pig! Eat and be merry now that you have shirked your responsibilities!
Those thugs! It would be too merciful to rip them apart and chew them up one at a time!
Hmm, could this be the assassin sent by those idiots from Aden?
I shall curse your name with my last breath!
I must break the seal and release Lord Shilen as soon as possible...
You shall taste the vengeance of Lord Shilen!
Lord Shilen... some day... you will accomplish... this mission...
He who desires immortality... Come unto me.
You shall be sacrificed to gain my immortality!
Eternal life in front of my eyes... I have collapsed in such a worthless way like this...
Zaken, you are a cowardly cur!
You are immortal, aren't you, Zaken?
Please return my body to me.
Finally... will I be able to rest?
Master Gildor does not like to be disturbed.
If you disturb Master Gildor I won't be able to help you.
You fools! Today you shall learn a lesson!
The past goes by... Is a new era beginning?...
This is the garden of Eva.
The garden of Eva is a sacred place.
Do you mean to insult Eva?
How rude! Eva's love is available to all, even to an ill-mannered lout like yourself!
This place once belonged to Lord Shilen.
Leave this palace to us, spirits of Eva.
Why are you getting in our way?
All who fear of Fafurion... Leave this place at once!
You are being punished in the name of Fafurion!
Oh, master... please forgive your humble servant...
Prepare to die, foreign invaders! I am Gustav, the eternal ruler of this fortress and I have taken up my sword to repel thee!
Glory to Aden, the Kingdom of the Lion! Glory to Sir Gustav, our immortal lord!
Soldiers of Gustav, go forth and destroy the invaders!
This is unbelievable! Have I really been defeated? I shall return and take your head!
Could it be that I have reached my end? I cannot die without honor, without the permission of Sir Gustav!
Ah, the bitter taste of defeat... I fear my torments are not over...
I follow the will of Fafurion.
Tickets for the Lucky Lottery are now on sale!
The Lucky Lottery drawing is about to begin!
The winning numbers for Lucky Lottery $s1 are $s2. Congratulations to the winners!
You're too young to play Lucky Lottery!
$s1! Come on, I'll take you on!
$s1! How dare you interrupt our fight! Hey guys, help!
I'll help you! I'm no coward!
Come out, you children of darkness!
Very impressive $s1! This is the last!
This world will soon be annihilated!
The day of judgment is near!
I bestow upon you a blessing!
The first rule of fighting is to start by killing the weak ones!
The main event will start in 2 minutes. Please register now.
The main event is now starting.
The main event will close in 5 minutes.
The main event will finish in 2 minutes. Please prepare for the next game.
The amount of SSQ contribution has increased by $s1.
That will do! I'll move you to the outside soon.
How dare you turn your back on me!
$s1! Leave us alone! This is between us!
$s1! Killing you will be a pleasure!
$s1! Hey! We're having a duel here!
How dare you interrupt a sacred duel! You must be taught a lesson!
I never thought I'd use this against a novice!
You won't take me down easily.
Enough fooling around. Get ready to die!
You idiot! I've just been toying with you!
I must admit, no one makes my blood boil quite like you do!
You have more skill than I thought!
All is lost! Prepare to meet the goddess of death!
All is lost! The prophecy of destruction has been fulfilled!
The end of time has come! The prophecy of destruction has been fulfilled!
$s1! You might as well give up!
You don't have any hope! Your end has come!
The prophecy of darkness has been fulfilled!
As foretold in the prophecy of darkness, the era of chaos has begun!
The prophecy of darkness has come to pass!
$s1! I give you the blessing of prophecy!
$s1! I bestow upon you the authority of the abyss!
Herald of the new era, open your eyes!
That will do. Prepare to be released!
Rulers of the seal! I bring you wondrous gifts!
Rulers of the seal! I have some excellent weapons to show you!
I've been so busy lately, in addition to planning my trip!
Your treatment of weaklings is unforgivable!
I'm here to help you! Hi yah!
Are you hurt? Hang in there, we've almost got them!
Why should I tell you my name, you creep!?
The defenders of $s1 castle will be teleported to the inner castle.
It's a good day to die! Welcome to hell, maggot!
The Festival of Darkness will end in two minutes.
Game over. The teleport will appear momentarily.
You, who are like the slugs crawling on the ground. The generosity and greatness of me, Daimon the White-Eyed is endless! Ha Ha Ha!
If you want to be the opponent of me, Daimon the White-Eyed, you should at least have the basic skills~!
You stupid creatures that are bound to the earth. You are suffering too much while dragging your fat, heavy bodies. I, Daimon, will lighten your burden.
A weak and stupid tribe like yours doesn't deserve to be my enemy! Bwa ha ha ha!
You dare to invade the territory of Daimon, the White-Eyed! Now, you will pay the price for your action!
This is the grace of Daimon the White-Eyed, the great Monster Eye Lord! Ha Ha Ha!

You may now enter the Sepulcher.
If you place your hand on the stone statue in front of each sepulcher, you will be able to enter.
This place is dangerous, $s1. Please turn back.
Begone, thief! Let our bones rest in peace.
Thieving Kakai, may bloodbugs gnaw you in your sleep!
Arrogant fool! You dare to challenge me, the Ruler of Flames? Here is your reward!
$s1!!!! You cannot hope to defeat me with your meager strength.
Not even the gods themselves could touch me. But you, $s1, you dare challenge me?! Ignorant mortal!

A delivery for Mr. Lector? Very good!
Hello, Mr. Lector! Long time no see, Mr. Jackson!
The Mother Tree is slowly dying.
How can we save the Mother Tree?
The Mother Tree is always so gorgeous!
Lady Mirabel, may the peace of the lake be with you!
The mass of darkness will start in a couple of days. Pay more attention to the guard!
Have a nice day, Mr. Garita and Mion!
Mr. Lid, Murdoc, and Airy! How are you doing?
A black moon... Now do you understand that he has opened his eyes?
Clouds of blood are gathering. Soon, it will start to rain. The rain of crimson blood...
While the foolish light was asleep, the darkness will awaken first. Uh huh huh...
It is the deepest darkness. With its arrival, the world will soon die.
Death is just a new beginning. Huhu... Fear not.
Ahh! Beautiful goddess of death! Cover over the filth of this world with your darkness!
The goddess's resurrection has already begun. Huhu... Insignificant creatures like you can do nothing!
Croak, Croak! Food like $s1 in this place?!
Pray that you caught a wrong fish $s1!
Do you know what a frog tastes like?
I will show you the power of a frog!
I will swallow at a mouthful!
Ugh, no chance. How could this elder pass away like this!
Croak! Croak! A frog is dying!
Kaak! $s1, What are you doing now?
Huh, $s1 You pierced into the body of the Spirit with a needle. Are you ready?
Ooh $s1 That's you. But, no lady is pleased with this savage invitation!
It is but a scratch! Is that all you can do?!
I will tell fish not to take your bait!
You bothered such a weak spirit...Huh, Huh
Ke, ke, ke, Rakul! Spin! Eh, eh, eh!
I won't be eaten up...Kah, ah, ah
$s1! You are the one who bothered my poor fish!
I will show you the power of a spear!
An old soldier does not die..! but just disappear...!
$s1, Take my challenge, the knight of water!
Discover $s1 in the treasure chest of fish!
I will show you spearmanship used in Dragon King's Palace!
This is the last gift I give you!
Your bait was too delicious! Now, I will kill you!
What a regret! The enmity of my brethren!
I'll pay you back! Somebody will have my revenge!
Cough... But, I won't be eaten up by you...!
$s1... How could you catch me from the deep sea...
$s1... Do you think I am a fish?
He, he, he. Do you want me to roast you well?
You didn't keep your eyes on me because I come from the sea?
Activity of life... Is stopped... Chizifc...
Uah, ah, ah, I couldn't eat anything for a long time!
I can swallow you at a mouthful!
What?! I am defeated by the prey!
You are my food! I have to kill you!
I can't believe I am eaten up by my prey... Gah!
You're lucky to have even seen me, $s1.
$s1, you can't leave here alive. Give up.
I will show you the power of the deep sea!
I will break the fishing pole!
Your corpse will be good food for me!

How dare you trespass into my territory! Have you no fear?
Fools! Why haven't you fled yet? Prepare to learn a lesson!
Bwah-ha-ha! Your doom is at hand! Behold the Ultra Secret Super Weapon!
Foolish, insignificant creatures! How dare you challenge me!
I see that none will challenge me now!
Urggh! You will pay dearly for this insult.

A pregnant wolf makes its home in a wide open place to have its babies.
A grown wolf is still not as heavy as a fully-grown male adult human.
A wolf changes into a werewolf during a full-moon.
The color of a wolf's fur is the same as the place where it lives.
A wolf enjoys eating Dwarves.

I must do something about this shameful incident...

Ahh, how can it end like this... it is not fair!

I am a tree of nothing... a tree... that knows where to return...
I am a creature that shows the truth of the place deep in my heart...
I am a mirror of darkness... a virtual image of darkness...
The concealed truth will always be revealed...!
Is it a lackey of Kakai?!
Is it a lackey of Kakai?!
I absolutely cannot give it to you! It is my precious jewel!
No! I haven't completely finished the command for destruction and slaughter yet!!!
How dare you wake me! Now you shall die!
Oh, it's not an opponent of mine. Ha, ha, ha!
Revenge is Overlord Ramsebalius of the evil world!
Bonaparterius, Abyss King, will punish you
Both hands to heaven! Everybody yell together!
One! Two! May your dreams come true!

If the eggs get taken, we're dead!

Above world people are so fun...! Then, see you later!
